protocol_name: MojoSort™ Human CD8 Memory T Cells Isolation Kit Protocol
protocol_name_html: MojoSort™ Human CD8 Memory T Cells Isolation Kit Protocol
description: The kit is designed for the isolation of human memory CD8 T cells from PBMC. Target cells are depleted by incubating the sample with the biotin antibody cocktail followed by incubation with magnetic Streptavidin Nanobeads. The magnetically labeled fraction is retained by the use of a magnetic separator. The untouched cells are collected. These are the cells of interest; do not discard the liquid. Some of the downstream applications include functional assays, gene expression, phenotypic characterization, etc.
keywords: mojosort, cell separation, cd8, t cell
guidelines: MojoSort™ magnetic particles can be used with other commercially available magnetic separators, both free standing magnets and column-based systems. Because MojoSort™ protocols are optimized for the MojoSort™ separator; the protocols may need to be adjusted for other systems. Please contact BioLegend Technical Service (tech@biolegend.com) for more information and guidance. We do not recommend using MojoSort™ particles for BD’s IMag™ or Life Technologies’ DynaMag™.

components.data: Prepare cells from your tissue of interest without lysing erythrocytes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare cells from your tissue of interest without lysing erythrocytes.

components.data:
In the final wash of your sample preparation, resuspend the cells in MojoSort™ Buffer by adding up to 4mL in a 5mL (12 x 75 mm) polypropylene tube.

 

Note: Keep MojoSort™ Buffer on ice throughout the procedure.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
In the final wash of your sample preparation, resuspend the cells in MojoSort™ Buffer by adding up to 4mL in a 5mL (12 x 75 mm) polypropylene tube.

 

Note: Keep MojoSort™ Buffer on ice throughout the procedure.

components.data: Filter the cells with a 70µm cell strainer, centrifuge at 300xg for 5 minutes, and resuspend in an appropriate volume of MojoSort™ Buffer. Count and adjust the cell concentration to 1 x 108 cells/mL.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter the cells with a 70µm cell strainer, centrifuge at 300xg for 5 minutes, and resuspend in an appropriate volume of MojoSort™ Buffer. Count and adjust the cell concentration to 1 x 108 cells/mL.

components.data:
Aliquot 100µL of cell suspension (107 cells) into a new tube. Add 10µL of the Biotin-Antibody Cocktail, mix well and incubate on ice for 15 minutes. Scale up the volume accordingly if separating more cells. For example, add 100µL for 1 x 108 cells. When working with less than 107 cells, use indicated volumes for 107cells.

 

Optional: Keep unused cells, or take an aliquot before adding the cocktail to monitor purity and yield.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Aliquot 100µL of cell suspension (107 cells) into a new tube. Add 10µL of the Biotin-Antibody Cocktail, mix well and incubate on ice for 15 minutes. Scale up the volume accordingly if separating more cells. For example, add 100µL for 1 x 108 cells. When working with less than 107 cells, use indicated volumes for 107cells.

 

Optional: Keep unused cells, or take an aliquot before adding the cocktail to monitor purity and yield.

components.data: Resuspend the beads by vortexing, maximum speed, 5 touches. Add 10µL of Streptavidin Nanobeads. Mix well and incubate on ice for 15 minutes. Scale up the volume accordingly if separating more cells. For example, add 100µL for 1 x 108 cells. When working with less than 107 cells, use indicated volumes for 107cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend the beads by vortexing, maximum speed, 5 touches. Add 10µL of Streptavidin Nanobeads. Mix well and incubate on ice for 15 minutes. Scale up the volume accordingly if separating more cells. For example, add 100µL for 1 x 108 cells. When working with less than 107 cells, use indicated volumes for 107cells.

components.data:
Wash the cells by adding 3mL of MojoSort™ Buffer; centrifuge at 300xg for 5 minutes, discard supernatant.

 

Optional: Take an aliquot before placing the tube in the magnet to monitor purity and yield.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Wash the cells by adding 3mL of MojoSort™ Buffer; centrifuge at 300xg for 5 minutes, discard supernatant.

 

Optional: Take an aliquot before placing the tube in the magnet to monitor purity and yield.

components.data:
Resuspend the cells in 3mL of MojoSort™ Buffer.

Note: If you observe aggregates, filter the suspension. To maximize yield, you can disrupt the aggregates by pipetting the solution up and down.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Resuspend the cells in 3mL of MojoSort™ Buffer.

Note: If you observe aggregates, filter the suspension. To maximize yield, you can disrupt the aggregates by pipetting the solution up and down.

components.data: Place the tube in the magnet for 5 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place the tube in the magnet for 5 minutes.

components.data: Pour out and collect the liquid. These are the cells of interest; DO NOT DISCARD.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pour out and collect the liquid. These are the cells of interest; DO NOT DISCARD.

components.data:
If needed, add 3mL of MojoSort™ Buffer and repeat steps 8 and 9 with the magnetically labeled fraction up to two times, and then pool the unlabeled fractions.

 

Note: Repeating the magnetic separation increases the yield, without a strong impact on the purity. The yield will typically increase about 8-10% with a second separation, and about 2-5% with a third separation. The purity may decrease 1-2% with each separation.

Optional: Take a small aliquot before placing the tube in the magnet to monitor purity and yield.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:

Optional: Take a small aliquot before placing the tube in the magnet to monitor purity and yield.
